text: Hey, let me ask you something. You know all those recordings from your Zoom meetings, Google Meet calls, team sessions? Yeah. They all end up in some Google Drive somewhere. And that's where they just disappear. All those product updates, training sessions, important decisions just buried in folders where nobody can find them. So that's why we built Bold Video. Let me show you around. This is what a bold portal looks like. We make it super easy to make it your. Add your logo, match your brand colors, customize the whole layout. And yeah, everything loads lightning fast, too. Here's the cool part, though. You see this search bar? Just type whatever you're looking for, let's say pricing strategy. And look, it instantly shows you every time someone talked about it in any video. And we built this AI thing. That's pretty sweet. You can literally ask it stuff like, what did we say about Q3 goals? And it pull it right up. What? Or give me the product roadmap highlights. Just like that. Super easy to get going too. You can either drop your videos right in here, or connect your Zoom Google Meet or Teams account. One click and all your recordings sync over automatically with perfect organization. Plus, since we built this to be flexible, it works with whatever systems your company already uses. Your company's login system, your interface, your security setup, it all just fits right in. Here's the thing, you're already making these videos anyway. We just make sure people can actually find and use what's in them instead of letting them disappear into a black hole forever. It's basically like having a knowledge base that builds itself, helping your whole team learn and grow faster. If you want to see how this would work for your team, I'd love to show you more. Just hit reply and let's chat.
